description: While in Port Temul for a fair, the Northern Edge Guard team run into a former comrade on hard times. Terio from the Eastern Edge Guard has left his team to pursue his former teammate Mitsuko. During the course of the fair, it is revealed that Mitsuko has been corrupted by a renegade group called the Dark Edge Guard. It is now the mission of the Northern Edge Guard to see how far the corruption has spread.

The Northern Edge Guard split up to deal with the Dark Edge Guard threat. Onoli and Sheila report to the Edge Guard Elders in the Retreat and learn some of the history of the Eastern Edge Guard. Meanwhile Thropan visits his old teacher for help treating Mitsuko and ends up fighting the air kitsune Yoten.

volume.name: Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie
Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie
Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie
Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie
Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie
Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie

description: The third and final exciting issue of Tsukasa Kotobuki's action-packed science fiction adventure comes speeding your way! Poporo and Gun are drawn into the climactic battle between the beautiful and deadly Sisters of Doom, Beretta and Rebecca! As the battle progresses, enemies become friends and friends become enemies in an all-out battle for survival! This issue features an all-new cover by Adam (GEN13, Titans, Dirty Pair) Warren! Plus, this issue also includes a short sneak-peek at some of the translated manga Radio Comix has lined up for 2000, including a new comic by Hisao Tamaki (Star Wars: A New Hope Manga)!

From the designer of Saber Marionette J and Battle Arena Toshinden comes a fast-paced, action-packed sci-fi manga adventure! In the distant future, a small rag-tag band of humans fight to save the last remnant of humanity against the deadly machines. Their only hope lies in a newly revived mechanical man and his unknown powers. Recommended for fans of Battle Angel Alita.
name: TPB

volume.name: Stellar Losers: Will Work for Oxygen

description: Popular Milk artist Darin Brown finally gets his own miniseries- meet Robin & Cindy, two fun-loving gals who are up for anything once- twice if they like it! The girls end up in a variety of situations and scenes, but always seem to come out on top!

Daredevil faces an old friend who has suddenly become very hostile: the Superior Spider-Man is here, and he's fighting-mad!

By Mark Waid and Chris Samnee.

The Avengers Academy students confront Jeremy Briggs in a shocking showdown – with dark consequences for one member!

By Christos Gage, Tom Grummett and Andrea Di Vito.

Rocket Raccoon gets a major shock in a prologue to Guardians of the Galaxy!

By Brian Michael Bendis and Ming Doyle.

Reprints:

  • Daredevil #22-23.
  • Avengers Academy #37.
  • Guardians of the Galaxy: Tomorrow's Avengers #1.

volume.name: Batman - Un deuil dans la famille

description: Super strength, the ability to fly and extra-speedy reflexes should make a girl's life easier, but they only seem to complicate things for Supergirl. Life gets a lot crazier, though, when a new enemy named Belinda Zee shows up. And with girls like Belinda around, facing down Super-Villains doesn't seem so bad.
name: TPB

volume.name: Supergirl: Cosmic Adventures in the 8th Grade

description:
Remember that time when Buffy's little sister Dawn first found out that Buffy is the Slayer? And then when Angel almost killed Dawn, because no one had told her that he'd turned evil again? Buffy and the gang all have memories connected to Dawn, and only Buffy and Giles know they're not real. But there are still a lot of unanswered questions as to how Dawn came into Buffy's life, and where these memories come from. Now, Dawn has vanished without a trace, and the Scooby gang has no clue where to find her. But Buffy will stop at nothing to find her little sister, even if she has to face off against a cadre of crazed, bloodsucking monks and a former Vampire Slayer turned Slayer Vampire!

Collects Buffy the Vampire Slayer #35-38.
name: False Memories

description:
Buffy's mom is dead, the emotions of Buffy and her friends are running high, and lots of little things are causing lots of little problems. With everybody preoccupied with grief, anger, guilt, and regret the fight against the forces of darkness doesn't seem all that crucial somehow. Somebody should have told that to the swarm of angry, deformed, green demon-children that are tearing apart Buffy's house and trying to chew off her face. Want it or not, Buffy has a fight on her hands. But one of her closest friends is keeping a secret that is either the key to victory -- or could get them all killed. Collecting the four-issue series, plus the super-spooky, slam-bang festival of fangs Night of 1000 Vampires one-shot!

Collects Buffy the Vampire Slayer #39-42.
name: Night of 1000 Vampires/Ugly Little Monsters

description:
Christopher Golden and Tom Sniegoski, writers of the videogame Buffy: Chaos Bleeds, bring the story straight to comics in this look into the twisted world of the game. The barriers between alternate realities have begun to erode around Sunnydale, and Buffy and the gang face nightmare versions of friends and allies, as well as enemies thought long dead. Featuring the return of the vampiric Gorch clan, Sid the Dummy, Faith and more!

Reprints Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds.
name: Chaos Bleeds

description:
In "Lost & Found" ... Buffy's dead. Her friends are trying to get on with their lives. Between them, there is enough anger, frustration, loss, guilt and tragedy to drown an ocean...or resurrect an ancient demon. Sunnydale being what it is means things aren't looking too good for the Scoobies. A lovelorn demon has been set free into our dimension, and its food is the grief of Buffy's nearest and dearest.

In "Rock ‘N' Roll All Night And Sleep Every Day" ... Spike runs into an old enemy from his punk days in NYC. Some vampires never change.

Collects Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Lost & Found and Spike In "Rock 'N' Roll All Night (And Sleep Every Day)" from Dark Horse Extra #49-50.
name: Lost & Found/Spike In "Rock 'N' Roll All Night (And Sleep Every Day)"

description:
Amber Benson, Buffy the Vampire Slayer's Tara, and acclaimed Buffy novelist Christopher Golden team up with one of the hottest new animation-to-comics transplants—artist Ajit Jothikaumar—to bring you the eagerly anticipated follow-up to last year's Willow & Tara special. In Wilderness, Willow, Tara, and Buffy's little sister Dawn are drawn into a web of magical intrigue and horror after stumbling upon a stretch of cursed earth just off the Pacific Coast Highway. Something controls the forest animals, causing them to attack and kill any human who wanders too far into the woods. Can the girls put an end to the mysterious force that's corrupting the natural order and make it back to civilization alive? Or will the woods claims three more victims?

Collects Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Willow & Tara - Wilderness.
name: Willow & Tara: Wilderness

description:
Buffy is dead. Her friends are trying to get on with their lives. Between them, there is enough anger, frustration, loss, guilt, and tragedy to resurrect an ancient demon. Things aren't looking too good for Willow, Xander, and the gang. A lovelorn demon has been set free into our dimension, and its food is the grief of Buffy's nearest and dearest. If that's not bad enough, a horde of demonic reptilian sorcerers plan to resurrect their fallen comrade and paint the town blood red. Can Buffy's friends face the threat without a Slayer to defend them? Willow finds that she can learn a great deal from these reptilian mystics. And if there's going to be one resurrection, why can't there be TWO?

Collects Buffy the Vampire Slayer #43-45.
name: The Death of Buffy

description:
When Buffy came back from the dead earlier this season, she received a call from Angel, asking for a secret rendezvous. When she came back to Sunnydale the next episode, she didn't tell anyone what happened while she was away. Now Jane Espenson, the TV scribe behind both those episodes, gives us a glimpse into that secret night...Featuring a reunion of Buffy artists dating from the very beginning of our series. This special one-shot, featuring extra story pages, brings back Randy Green, Chynna Clugston-Major, Ryan Sook, and many more. Fronted by Jeff Matsuda, who's drawn more Buffy covers than any other artist, this is a must for followers of the show.

Reprints Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Reunion.
name: Reunion

description:
Buffy's finally back in the game, fully recovered from her recent trip to heaven. But someone else is back, too—the sexy vamp D.J., Velatti (from the recent hit novel Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Creatures of Habit). She's out for revenge, and she's noticed that Willow's powerful addiction to magic is growing out of control. Check out the cosmic comic-book debut of the dopest D.J. diva, that will make more than your head spin... It's a hard-trance thriller brought to you by novelists Tom Fassbender and Jim Pascoe, featuring the tweaky visuals of guest artist Paul Lee, one half of the art team from the Buffy illustrated novel Creatures of Habit.

Reprints Buffy the Vampire Slayer #46.
name: Withdrawal

description:
This volume collects Buffy newcomer Scott Lobdell's (X-men, Highroads) debut story arc along side veteran Buffy scribe Fabian Nicieza! Joining established Buffy artist Cliff Richards, Lobdell and Nicieza begin their run by wrapping up four years worth of stories, featuring many returning faces. This story paves the way for a whole new direction for the Buffy comics. Collecting issues #47-50 of the ongoing Buffy the Vampire Slayer series.

Collects Buffy the Vampire Slayer #47-50.
name: Note From the Underground

description: The third PS238 collection is here! Gathering issues 11 through 15 and adding loads of supplemental ps238 comics, this third collection is the best ever! You'll meet Malphast, the half-demon, half-angel; travel through time; see the return of the Rainmaker; go on a rescue with the Revenant and more!
name: Volume III

description:
List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverChris Scalf1
REWizard World Cover, Limited to 1000?2
REWizard World Sketch Cover, Limited to 500?3

volume.name: Star Wars: Darth Maul - Son of Dathomir, May the 4th Special Digital Preview

description: A supernatueral action/adventue/romantic comedy that will appeal to fans of Buffy the Vampire Slayer and Charmed.
name: Book One

description: Maxion is full of action, suspense, and romance, with fabulous, exciting, and sensual art by Takeshi Takebayashi (Time Traveler Ai, Battle Arena Toshinden)! In this second volume of the series, Maki is revealed to have supernatural powers too! She's kidnapped by the supernatural demon Volf, and Shion and Maki combine their powers to defeat him. Then the handsome Yuichiro discovers how deep his feelings for Maki are, as they share their first kiss. Fans who like good-girl art, character driven stories, and supernatural thrills will love Maxion.
name: Book Two

description: Maki, Shion, and Yuichiro have enough problems just trying to decide amongst themselves where their feelings lie. Now its time for things to get much more complicated with two more otherworldly love interests. Its love, lust and scandal in Maxion Book Three: Waves Of Misfortune!
name: Book Three

description: Yuichiro is out of control. His sexual urges have taken over his psyche and the beautiful coed Shion is the object of his desires. What will happen if his true love Maki finds out? And what happened to the sexy health professor? Beautiful women, hapless students, and a dose of voyeurism with sci-fi suspense!
name: Book Four
Hinderlaag in de kloof der Apachen

description:
Betrayed by his friends and exiled on the planet Sakaar, becomes the Hulk the slave of the merciless Red King. He forces him, to fight as a gladiator in the Great Arena, but at the same time becomes the Hulk the idol of the suppressed people. Will the green Goliath help to free this world - or will he destroy it?

Collects: The Incredible Hulk (Vol. 2) #92-99
name: Vol. 45 - Der unglaubliche Hulk - Planet Hulk, Teil 1

description:
The rebellion on Sakaar goes on! As the deciding battle moves closer, have the Hulk and his fellows to join forces against the forces of the Red King. But even if they succeed, to overthrow his cruel regime, it remains to be seen, if the Hulk really can bring peace to this torn world.

Collects: The Incredible Hulk (Vol. 2) #100-105 & Amazing Fantasy #15
name: Vol. 46 - Der unglaubliche Hulk - Planet Hulk, Teil 2

volume.name: A Grange Story: Finding My Place

description:
Stranded

Some people go a lifetime without poking big ol' hairy Death with a stick just to see what'll happen. But shape-shifting alien Decoy and his best buddy, Bobby Luck, find themselves in mortal peril every other day. Why should an afternoon birdwatching excursion be any different?

Archer Coe performs his show for the night, with Hope in tow. But when his hypnotism routine goes wrong, Archer fears his mind is no longer his own. What's happening to Archer Coe? Could the police have really found their man? Is Archer Coe actually the Zipper like they say?
name: Chapter 10

volume.name: Archer Coe and the Thousand Natural Shocks

description: When school lets out for the summer, sometimes your allowance can't cover everything you want to do. The solution: Get a job! The Riverdale crew is rolling up their sleeves and going to work in this 100-page digital exclusive. Can Archie find a summer job? Can Jughead keep his summer job? And Veronica has a summer job?! You can't miss the nutty antics of these workplace weirdoes!

volume.name: B & V Friends: Get A Job!
